tickets.title: Password Reset Request
tickets.description: User unable to login after returning from vacation. Multiple failed attempts resulted in account lockout.
tickets.resolution: Password reset completed and account unlocked. User confirmed access restored.

tickets.title: Email synchronization issues
tickets.description: Outlook not syncing emails on mobile device. Emails appear on desktop but not mobile app.
tickets.resolution: Investigating IMAP configuration. Working with user to reconfigure mobile email settings.

tickets.title: Printer driver installation
tickets.description: New printer HP LaserJet Pro installed but driver not working correctly. Print jobs stuck in queue.
tickets.resolution: Updated printer drivers installed. Print spooler restarted. All functions now working normally.

tickets.title: VPN connection failures
tickets.description: Remote worker unable to maintain stable VPN connection. Drops every 10-15 minutes causing work disruption.
tickets.resolution: Assigned to network team for investigation. User provided connectivity logs.

tickets.title: Software installation request - Adobe Creative Suite
tickets.description: Marketing team member needs Adobe Creative Suite for upcoming project. Business justification provided.
tickets.resolution: Business case approved. Adobe Creative Suite license purchased and software installed successfully.

tickets.title: Teams audio not working in meetings
tickets.description: User reports microphone not working in Microsoft Teams meetings. Audio input not detected by application.
tickets.resolution: Teams app permissions updated. Microphone privacy settings corrected. Audio now working in all meetings.

tickets.title: Network drive access denied
tickets.description: Cannot access shared department folder on network drive. Permission denied error when attempting to open.
tickets.resolution: User permissions updated in Active Directory. Network drive access restored with appropriate folder permissions.

tickets.title: Computer performance degradation
tickets.description: Workstation extremely slow. Applications taking several minutes to open. Affecting productivity significantly.
tickets.resolution: RAM upgrade performed (8GB to 16GB). Disk cleanup completed. SSD health checked. Performance restored to normal levels.

tickets.title: Database connection timeout
tickets.description: Production database experiencing intermittent connection timeouts. Critical business applications affected.
tickets.resolution: Escalated to senior DBA. Performance monitoring increased.

tickets.title: Security certificate expired
tickets.description: SSL certificate for internal portal expired. Users getting security warnings.
tickets.resolution: New SSL certificate installed and configured. All security warnings resolved.

tickets.title: Mobile device setup
tickets.description: New employee needs company iPhone configured with email and security policies.
tickets.resolution: iPhone 14 configured with MDM profile. Email and company apps installed successfully.

tickets.title: Backup system failure
tickets.description: Nightly backup job failed for 3 consecutive days. Data protection at risk.
tickets.resolution: Backup storage hardware replaced. Testing restore procedures.

tickets.title: Video conferencing audio issues
tickets.description: Meeting room audio system producing echo and feedback during video calls.
tickets.resolution: Audio calibration performed. Microphone positioning adjusted. Echo cancellation enabled.

tickets.title: Software license compliance audit
tickets.description: Quarterly software license audit required. Need inventory of all installed software.
tickets.resolution: Automated scanning tool deployed. Initial results collected.

tickets.title: Server maintenance window
tickets.description: Scheduled maintenance for email servers. Need approval for weekend downtime.
tickets.resolution: Maintenance window approved for Saturday 2-6 AM. All updates completed successfully.

tickets.title: Phishing email investigation
tickets.description: Suspicious email reported by multiple users. Potential security threat.
tickets.resolution: Email quarantined. Sender blocked. Security awareness training scheduled.

tickets.title: Cloud storage quota exceeded
tickets.description: Department shared drive exceeding storage limit. Need quota increase or data cleanup.
tickets.resolution: Storage quota increased from 2TB to 5TB. Old files archived to cold storage.

tickets.resolution: Ticket created and queued for assignment
